text: is a Japanese futsal club, currently playing in the F. League Division 1. The team is located in Hiratsuka city, Kanagawa prefecture, Japan. Their main arena is Odawara Arena. ==Chronicle== {| class="toccolours" style="font- size:93%"; !colspan="2" align=center| Chronicle of Shonan Bellmare futsal |- | {| |valign="top" width="33%"| * 2007 – Founded * 2007–2008 – 5th F.League * 2008–2009 – 7th F.League * 2009–2010 – 8th F.League * 2010–2011 – 8th F.League * 2011–2012 – 8th F.League * 2012–2013 – 9th F.League * 2013–2014 – 9th F.League * 2014–2015 – 10th F.League * 2015–2016 – 10th F.League * 2016–2017 – 10th F.League * 2017–2018 – 3rd F.League * 2018–2019 – 4th F.League Division 1 |} |} == Trophies == none ==References== == External links == * Category:Futsal clubs in Japan Category:Shonan Bellmare Category:Futsal clubs established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in Japan
